description:
Shinobu is the youngest child of a wealthy samurai family from Nagano. His oldest brother, Akira, has been missing for 3 years, and his sister, Nagisa, is psychotic. Shinobu`s parents are distant, at best.
Needless to say, Shinobu is not close to his family and he entered the dorms with the primary goal of getting away.
Shinobu is Student Council President in his second year and roommate to Ikeda Mitsuru.
He is friends with Noriko, a morose painter who was once in love with his brother -- and who may have transferred her affections to Shinobu.
name: Tezuka Shinobu
